comments:
This error occours while running Eclipse SDK 3.0.2 (gtk-amd64 build) on the
Ubuntu Linux/amd64 OS (clean install/new workspace/Sun JDK 5.0 64bits). 

When I try to invoke the "Installed JRE's" dialog I get an error message saying
"The currently displayed page contains invalid values".

See the attachment and steps in bug 89911.  :(

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 89911 ***
